rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: RMA Request Alert for RMA Admin Review

value.stringValue: AND( [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName ='RMA_Request', ISPICKVAL([Case].Status,'Pending RMA Admin Review'), NOT(ISPICKVAL($User.UserType, 'PowerPartner') ))
AND( [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName ='RMA_Request', ISPICKVAL([Case].Status,'Pending RMA Admin Review'), [Case].CFO_Approved__c =True, NOT(ISPICKVAL($User.UserType, 'PowerPartner') ))
